/usr/bin/c++     CMakeFiles/teste1.dir/teste1_generated_teste1.cu.o CMakeFiles/teste1.dir/teste1_intermediate_link.o  -o teste1  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so /usr/local/lib/libhpx_wrap.a /usr/local/lib/libhpx_init.a /usr/local/lib/libhpx.so.1.6.0 /usr/local/lib/libhpx_core.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtcmalloc_minimal.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libhwloc.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_filesystem.so /usr/local/lib/libhpx_parallelism.so -latomic -lrt /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so -Wl,-wrap=main
